entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
